column4: Is there a difference for the Software Resources when the server is selected ? "Main Server" and Local country server for example ?
no
why then when selecting "main server" new updates are being found which are not found when using "local" server ?
what 'local' server are you referring to?
well at default my server is set to "Server for Bulgaria" and when i check for updates it found updates and installed them, but when i switch to "Main server" it finds even more updates
possibly the mirror for bulgaria hasn't updated yet
so if i wait i will have the same result like with the main server ?
it should yes.
ok thank you
leave out the . in the launcher
it doesn't start that way eather :(
have only 1 / seperating lkeyholtv
yes only one / and it doesn't start, but it starts when i go to the folder in terminal and do ./lkeyholetv command
check the path again. any spelling/case errors?
no i used the Browse button to locate the file maby thats why ?
/home/t0m0rr0w/Desktop/KeyHoleTV/lkeyholetv
is the file executable?
yes that option is selected in properties
allow executing file as programm
if the spelling/case is correct i honestly don't know.
ok thanks anyway
i also tryed the "Make Link" option, when the link file is in the same folder as the app, the app starts, but when i move it elsewhere it doesn't o-o
only for information i added the executable to /usr/bin/install -c lkeyholetv /usr/local/bin  and cp -r .KeyHoleTV  /usr/local/bin and now the shortcut works systemwide :) ^_^
